title: Power vs. Force: The Hidden Determinants of Human Behavior
description: From the "Imagine - what if you had access to a simple yes-or-no answer to any question you wished to ask? A demonstrably true answer. Any question... Think about it." From the "Man thinks he lives by virtue of the forces he can control, but in fact, he's governed by power from unrevealed sources, power over which he has no control."
author: David R. Hawkins
